entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 06:32 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
